thread.section_title: World News | The Times and The Sunday Times
thread.title: Katy Perry joins all-female Blue Origin space mission with Bezos's fiancée
thread.title_full: Katy Perry joins all-female Blue Origin space mission with Bezos's fiancée

author: Bevan Hurley, New York
title: Katy Perry joins all-female Blue Origin space mission with Bezos's fiancée
text:
A news anchor, a rocket scientist, a civil rights activist and a film producer walk onto a spaceship. Joining them in this new frontier for tourism is a billionaire’s fiancée and a pop superstar.
For the space-curious adventurer, suborbital flights on board rockets that fly 60 miles above the Earth’s surface typically come at a hefty price. But it turns out there is another way to go boldly — it helps to have befriended Lauren Sánchez, who has been engaged to Jeff Bezos since 2023.
Bezos’s Blue Origin space company has announced that Sánchez will join the singer Katy Perry and four others on his next space tourism mission. They will be the first all-female space crew since the 1960s to go where a few
